scripts.build: set -e; npm run tsc; npm run rollup; npm run terser
scripts.rollup: for p in ./src/main/{index,html}.ts; do rollup --input $p --dir ./lib --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-typescript; done
scripts.terser: for p in ./lib/{index,html}.js; do terser --compress --mangle toplevel --output $p -- $p; done
